com.vector.cfg.consistency.groovy.api

Interface IValidationResultCreationApi


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IValidationResultCreationApi
    The IValidationResultCreationApi provides methods to create new IValidationResult instances via the IValidationResultBuilder to add validation-results e.g during generation.
    The resultCreation API provides methods to create new IValidationResults, which could then be reported to a IValidationResultSink. This is can be used to report validation-results similar to a validator/generator, but from within a script task.
    ValidationResultSink
    The IValidationResultSink must be obtained by the context and is not provided by the creation API. E.g. some script tasks pass an IValidationResultSink as argument (like DV_GENERATION_STEP). If you don't get a sink from the script task, you can not report any IValidationResults.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

        Creates a new ValidationResultBuilder object, which can be used to build an IValidationResult.
        Parameters:
        resultId - The IValidationResultId of the IValidationResult
        severityType - The Severity of the result
        description - The description
        Returns:
        A new builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • if resultId is null
        • if severityType is null
        • if description is null
        See Also:
        ValidationResultBuilder#buildResult()

      • newResultBuilder

        @PublishedMethod
ValidationResultBuilder newResultBuilder(IValidationResultId resultId,
                                                           EValidationSeverityType severityType,
                                                           java.lang.String formatPattern,
                                                           java.lang.Object... patternArguments)
        Creates a new ValidationResultBuilder object, which can be used to build an IValidationResult.

        The descriptionPattern parameter is a MixedText pattern.
        See MixedText.format(String, Object...) with the parameters descriptionPattern and patternArguments for more details.

        Parameters:
        resultId - The IValidationResultId of the IValidationResult
        severityType - The Severity of the result
        formatPattern - The description pattern for IMixedTextBuilder.appendFormat(String, Object...)
        patternArguments - The arguments for the descriptionPattern
        Returns:
        A new builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • if resultId is null
        • if severityType is null
        • if formatPattern is null
        • if patternArguments is null
        See Also:
        ValidationResultBuilder#buildResult()

        • if formatPattern is null
        • if patternArguments is null
        See Also:
